title: Chargers-Raiders TNF Preview, Can LAC/Oakland make a real playoff push? (Football 11/7)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to preview Chargers-Raiders on Thursday Night Football. The guys discuss the chances either of these teams make the playoffs, the impact of injuries on this game, Melvin Gordon's usage, Derek Carr's improvement and the Khalil Mack trade before issuing player props and picks for this game
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
